title: BitTorrent Sync Beta Windows
description:
BitTorrent Sync Beta for Windows

BitTorrent Sync never stores your files on servers, so they stay safe from data breaches and prying eyes. Similar to Dropbox but files stay on your computer. BitTorrent Sync skips the cloud to deliver your files at lightning speed. No matter where you are. Create a Sync folder for your stuff. Open it on any computer, phone, or tablet. Access docs, share photos, and start working from anywhere. Use the Android app and share between your computer and Android device.

Please remember to seed!

Feel free to comment below!
